attributes.action: Allow workers use mobile phones in the workplace as translation  application
attributes.additional_details: The reason is that not every worker is proficient in English.  If we can allow employers and workers to use mobile phone translators to communicate when necessary, the work will become more efficient and complete and reduce Misunderstand
attributes.background: We hope that this revision will help employers communicate effectively with workers of different races.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about phone usage by employees are a matter for individual workplaces, not the UK Government or Parliament.
